scriptinfo.init: local tbl = {['AMGPack'] = {['1'] = 27091275, ['2'] = 28796661}, ['Radio'] = {['1'] = 21946873, ['2'] = 29043331}, ['PortableGarage'] = {['1'] = 17342029, ['2'] = 30549953}, ['VIP'] = {['1'] = 17363175, ['2'] = 30550136}, ['PremiumBoost'] = {['1'] = 21390337, ['2'] = 30550240}, ['AudiPack'] = {['1'] = 30532797, ['2'] = 30549696}} local rs = game:GetService('ReplicatedStorage') local players = game:GetService('Players') local productInfo = require(rs.Modules.ProductInfo) local event = rs.Analytics.UpdateProductInfo local realTbl = {} for name, val in pairs(tbl) do local realVal = {} if math.random(1, 2) == 1 then table.insert(realVal, 1, val['1']) table.insert(realVal, 2, val['2']) else table.insert(realVal, 1, val['2']) table.insert(realVal, 2, val['1']) end realTbl[name] = realVal productInfo.Gamepasses[name] = realVal event:FireAllClients(name, realVal) end players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(plr) for name, val in pairs(realTbl) do event:FireClient(plr, name, val) end end)
